channel.title: RSCD Sprite Editor
channel.description:
Hello!
Does anyone have a download link for RSCD Sprite Editor? The DL links i have found does not work, seems to be to old or removed. I wish to edit the file Items.RSCD - Can't figure out how to save it correctly. Becuase client wont start correctly when i have saved it. I get this error: http://puu.sh/nbsin/430e3e9fd1.png
I would be very thankfull.
Regards

item.title: RSCD Sprite Editor
item.dc:creator: @brwn brwn
item.description:
@brwn wrote:

when a shop is set to a general store it will buy all items, if it is not, it will only buy items which it sells.
That’s is all server side in Shops.xml

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD Sprite Editor
item.dc:creator: @RSCServer RSCServer
item.description:
@RSCServer wrote:

Thanks, thought i checked that, seems not.

Anyway i found out how to edit the .RSCD file, so thats good.

Could anyone help me to find a guide or tell me how to edit General Store, so a user can sell All items in their inventory to the shop? Witch file to edit?

Regards

Read full topic
